alert.note: Alert for Bienville; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 11:21AM CDT until March 30 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern De Soto Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Red River Parish in northwestern Louisiana... North central Natchitoches Parish in northwestern Louisiana... South central Bienville Parish in northwestern Louisiana... * Until noon CDT. * At 1121 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 10 miles east of Mansfield, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Coushatta around 1135 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Carmel, Evelyn, Castor, Hall Summit, Grand Bayou, Martin, Edgefield, Hanna, Womack and Crichton. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; De Soto; Natchitoches; Red River
